document_data.name: Twilight Bloom
document_data.mainbody: The '''Twilight bloom''', also known as a '''purple blossom plant''' or '''purple death''', was a very rare species of [[poison]]ous plants.
document_data.Description:
Twilight blooms largely bore a resemblance to [[palm|palm trees]]. They had thick, scaled brown trunks that sprouted no branches and on average grew to heights of {{SIrange|8|13|ft}}. The foliage at their tops were fronds that drooped a short distance. Their roots were visible on the surface around their base, resembling a fine mossy mat.

Within this the foliage tops of this plant grew purple, cup-shaped flowers with silver stamen. The sap of these flowers was very sweet and they exuded an attractive sent.
document_data.Behavior: Twilight blooms displayed no form of sentience or higher intelligence.

Biology.Reproduction: The twilight bloom reproduced in the same manner as most plant species.

Ecology.Diet: The twilight bloom was a partially carnivorous species of plant. The decomposition of creatures killed by their sap served to fertilize their root network.
Ecology.Habitats:
Twilight blooms were typically found in swamps and areas with a temperate climate.

In the region of [[Kara-Tur]], these plants were known to grow on the island of [[Akari]]. Particularly in the area around [[Opawangchicheng]].
Ecology.Relationships: Twilight blooms were a [[favored plant]] of the [[deity]] [[Sheela Peryroyl]].
